name: Power is Down
description:
Power is Down is a 2.5D platforming game set in a dystopian future where humanity has depleted all its energy resources. You control a robot sent into the mines below to collect energy crystals. Can you survive the energy draining mines and return with the energy crystals?

UNIVERSITY OF CHESTER PROJECT DETAILS

Power is Down was created for our first year Game Design Theory and Implementation module. Students are taught game theory and how to use a game engine (Unity) to create a short single player PC game.

CONTROLS

  • W and D: Move left and right
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • Left mouse button: Phase ability
  • Right mouse button: Use (for switches)

REQUIREMENTS

  • Windows PC
  • Keyboard and Mouse

TEAM MEMBERS

  • 1 x Level 4 Student (first year)

COURSE DETAILS
